output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: No visible CMF number, though this doesn't automatically disqualify it as propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" and promotes him as presidential candidate.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid Facebook/Instagram post addressing "Dragi cetățeni" and targeting a significant audience (1000-1999 impressions).
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clear electoral objectives: - Direct call to vote for Marcel Ciolacu as president - Direct call to vote for PSD in parliamentary elections - Promotes Adela Geamănu as PSD candidate for Chamber of Deputies
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication from PSD Dolj, structured as campaign material.
The post violates Article 55 t) because: - It continues presidential electoral propaganda after the campaign period ended - Makes direct appeals to vote for a presidential candidate - Is a paid promotion running after the presidential campaign period - Combines parliamentary election (still legal) with presidential election messaging (illegal at this point)

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains direct calls to vote - Promotes specific candidates - Is paid political advertising - Makes campaign promises - Uses party platform to influence voters
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Dolj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj electoral platit pe Facebook (ID: 596284366168045) ce continua propaganda electorala pentru candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie. Postarea contine indemnuri directe de vot ("Votați Marcel Ciolacu, președintele României!") si este promovata activ dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, incalcand astfel prevederile legale privind incetarea campaniei electorale. Mesajul are caracter electoral explicit si este distribuit contra cost pe platformele Facebook si Instagram, cu un impact estimat intre 1000-1999 de utilizatori.
